Articles.Content:
I like the smell of white vinegar, yes, but distilled, I think not.

The user below me know a guy called Elarcis.

Nope, and I meant just white vinegar. Around where I live it's called white distilled, but it's really white. Sorry for the confusion.

User below me loves everybody and finds it terribly difficult to hate and get enraged at somebody or a particular group of people.

Nope. (Remember when I said I had trouble breathing? Well, I think it was because of how I was lying down)

User below me hates everyone (Like me)

Trueish. Not everyone but most.

The user below me hates the words YOLO and SWAG

Who doesn't?

The user below me makes SSTO's

nope

the userbelow me has here for the great mod trains and thread killings

False? I don't understand what you just said.

the user below me has played half life 2

If you count on the Orange Box, then true.

The user below me owns a Smart TV.

true, only the highest quality of tv for watching ponies.

The user below me has rage quit in KSP at least once.

True, Especially when stuff just explodes for no reason. Like a kerbal falling onto minmus' surface from about 2 feet up and it just destroys the entire universe.

The user below me plays using RSS.

I have no clue what RSS is, so probably false.

The user below me celebrates Christmas.

Hell Yeah

The user below me celebrates Hanuka

False. I have no purpose for holidays.

The the user below came to two open doors, they went through the door on their left.

False.

The user below me is either a mod, or an eleven

True (I am an Eleven) All Hail Britannia! All hail Lelouch!

The user below me watches anime. (No. MLP does NOT count!)

Yes. Sometimes.

The user below reads manga.

I certainly do!

The user below me is a high school student.

not at the moment im curently a tester so ya

the user below me is testing starbound(the terraria like game)
nope the user below me is not a hatter

eh yes and no i hate on annoying bronies that try to corrupt you all the time

the user below me saw i was missing the second part of my post and was waiting for me to fix it

Edited December 9, 2013 by toolofdarkness

No, was at school when you posted.

The user below me doesn't know how he ended up in here.

Edit; Kreuzung you damned ninja

No, that is definitely false. I know very well that boredom and procrastination led me down this dark twisted path.

The user below uses proper grammar and punctuation, and therefore is nice for the eyes and the brain.

True(Ish)(Sometimes)

The user below me is or once was a mod on these forums.

false

the user below me will start a mod post train

Did someone say Mod Post Train?

The poster below me will not be a moderator.
